properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued January 10 at 3:47PM EST until January 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY
EVENING...

The National Weather Service in Louisville has expanded the

* Flash Flood Watch to include a portion of Indiana, including
the following areas, Crawford, Jefferson, Orange, Scott, and
Washington.

* From 1 AM EST Saturday through Saturday evening

* Persistent rains today will be followed by heavier rains late
tonight into Saturday, increasing the risk for flash flooding.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST SATURDAY THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING
